Method Detail

setAxes

void setAxes(AxesConfigurationDTO axes)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                    MicroscopeLockedException
Initializes the axes of the microscope. Depending on the setup, the units with which the microscope calculates internally may or may not be equal to microns and the axes may or may not be in the directions of the axes of the microplate.

Parameters:
axes - The axes configuration.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MicroscopeLockedException

getAxes

AxesConfigurationDTO getAxes()
                             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Returns the current axes' configuration.

Returns:
Current axes configuration.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

setChannelTimeout

void setChannelTimeout(int timeOutInMillis)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Sets an additional timeout when changing the channel for synchronization purposes.

Parameters:
timeOutInMillis - The timeout (wait) in milli seconds.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

getChannelTimeout

int getChannelTimeout()
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Returns the current timeout when changing a channel.

Returns:
Current timeout (default = 0).
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
